00053 template<class T,int d>
00054 struct Data
00055 {
00056     T x[d];
00057 
00058     const T& operator[](const int i) const {return x[i];}
00059     T& operator[](const int i) {return x[i];}
00060 };
00061 typedef Data<int,1> DataI;
00062 typedef Data<float,1> DataF;
00063 typedef Data<float,3> DataV;
00064 
00065 
00066 template<bool constant> class ParticleIterator;
00067 
00068 struct Provider
00069 {
00070     virtual void setupIteratorNextBlock(ParticleIterator<true>& iterator) const=0;
00071     virtual void setupIteratorNextBlock(ParticleIterator<false>& iterator)=0;
00072     virtual void setupAccessor(ParticleIterator<true>& iterator,ParticleAccessor& accessor) const=0;
00073     virtual void setupAccessor(ParticleIterator<false>& iterator,ParticleAccessor& accessor)=0;
00074     virtual ~Provider(){}
00075 };
00076 
00077 template<bool constant>
00078 struct PROVIDER
00079 {
00080     typedef Provider TYPE;
00081 };
00082 template<>
00083 struct PROVIDER<true>
00084 {
00085     typedef const Provider TYPE;
00086 };
00087 
00088 // TODO: non copyable
00089 struct ParticleAccessor
00090 {
00091     int stride;
00092     char* basePointer;
00093     int attributeIndex; // index of attribute opaque, do not touch
00094     int count;
00095 private:
00096     ParticleAttributeType type;
00097     
00098     ParticleAccessor* next;
00099 
00100 public:
00101     ParticleAccessor(const ParticleAttribute& attr)
00102         :stride(0),basePointer(0),attributeIndex(attr.attributeIndex),
00103         count(attr.count),type(attr.type),next(0)
00104     {}
00105 
00106     template<class TDATA,class TITERATOR> TDATA* raw(const TITERATOR& it)
00107     {return reinterpret_cast<TDATA*>(basePointer+it.index*stride);}
00108 
00109     template<class TDATA,class TITERATOR> const TDATA* raw(const TITERATOR& it) const
00110     {return reinterpret_cast<const TDATA*>(basePointer+it.index*stride);}
00111 
00112     template<class TDATA,class TITERATOR> TDATA& data(const TITERATOR& it)
00113     {return *reinterpret_cast<TDATA*>(basePointer+it.index*stride);}
00114 
00115     template<class TDATA,class TITERATOR> const TDATA& data(const TITERATOR& it) const
00116     {return *reinterpret_cast<const TDATA*>(basePointer+it.index*stride);}
00117 
00118     friend class ParticleIterator<true>;
00119     friend class ParticleIterator<false>;
00120 };
00121 
00122 
00123 template<bool constant=false>
00124 class ParticleIterator
00125 {
00126 public:
00127 private:
00128     typedef typename PROVIDER<constant>::TYPE PROVIDER;
00129 
00131     PROVIDER* particles;
00132 
00133 public:
00135     size_t index;
00136 private:
00137 
00139     size_t indexEnd;
00140 
00142     ParticleAccessor* accessors;
00143 
00144 public:
00146     ParticleIterator()
00147         :particles(0),index(0),indexEnd(0),accessors(0)
00148     {}
00149 
00151     ParticleIterator(const ParticleIterator& other)
00152                 :particles(other.particles),index(other.index),indexEnd(other.indexEnd),accessors(0)
00153     {}
00154 
00158     ParticleIterator(PROVIDER* particles,size_t index,size_t indexEnd)
00159         :particles(particles),index(index),indexEnd(indexEnd)
00160     {}
00161 
00163     bool valid() const
00164     {return particles;}
00165 
00167     ParticleIterator operator++(int)
00168     {
00169         ParticleIterator newIt(*this);
00170         index++;
00171         return newIt;
00172     }
00173 
00175     ParticleIterator& operator++()
00176     {
00177         index++;
00178         // TODO: make particles==0 check unnecessary by using indexEnd=0 to signify invalid iterator
00179         if((index>indexEnd) && particles) particles->setupIteratorNextBlock(*this);
00180         return *this;
00181     }
00182 
00184     bool operator==(const ParticleIterator& other)
00185     {
00186         // TODO: this is really really expensive
00187         // TODO: this needs a block or somethingt o say which segment it is
00188         return particles==other.particles && index==other.index;
00189     }
00190      
00192     bool operator!=(const ParticleIterator& other)
00193     {
00194         if(other.particles!=particles) return true; // if not same delegate
00195         else if(particles==0) return false; // if both are invalid iterators
00196         else return !(*this==other);
00197     }
00198     
00199     void addAccessor(ParticleAccessor& newAccessor)
00200     {
00201         newAccessor.next=accessors;
00202         accessors=&newAccessor;
00203         if(particles) particles->setupAccessor(*this,newAccessor);
00204     }
00205 
00206 
00207     // TODO: add copy constructor that wipes out accessor linked list
00208 
00209 };
00210 
00211 template<class T,int d>
00212 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& output,const Data<T,d>& v)
00213 {
00214     output<<v[0];
00215     for(int i=1;i<d;i++) output<< " " << v[i];
00216     return output;
00217 }

00220 }
